my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Kami perlukan bantuan kamu untuk alihkan pokok ini.

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Jalan kita sudah dibuka ~meow. Terima kasih @user.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Dan kita juga telah temui huruf Hijaiyah yang kedua iaitu `Ba`.

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Dahan pokok dan bunga di bawahnya membentuk huruf `Ba`.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Dan kita hanya perlu mencari huruf Hijaiyah `Ta` dan `Tsa`.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Oh no! What do we do, Alif?

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: This is bad. We can't get past this branch.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: We need your help moving this branch out of the way.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Hooray! We can continue on our path thanks to @user.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: And we've also found the next Hijaiyah letter, `Ba`.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Ah~ the branch and the flower below it look like the Hijaiyah letter `Ba`.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: So now we only need to find `Ta` and `Tsa`.
